backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: progressive speed increase mechanism and visual speed feedback indicators, both with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary describing App.tsx as a complete Flappy Bird game with speed mechanics and index.css containing custom animations for speed indicators.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Complete Flappy Bird game implementation with canvas rendering, progressive speed multiplier system that increases every 10 seconds, collision detection, scoring, and visual speed indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook for managing backend actor instances with Internet Identity authentication, handling actor creation and query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color variables and custom keyframe animations (pulse-glow, slide-in) for Flappy Bird speed indicators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point setting up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with OKLCH color system, custom border radius, animations (accordion-down/up), and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking two completed features (progressive speed increase and visual feedback) for a 2D Flappy Bird game with one pending feature request.
